detaileddescription.para: last time for sending sensor values in ms

memberdef.name: LWM2MObjectSensorDeviceResources
memberdef.initializer: = { { 0, LWM2M_DYNAMIC(Interval) }, { 1, LWM2M_BOOL(true) }, { 2, LWM2M_BOOL(true) }, { 3, LWM2M_BOOL(true) }, { 4, LWM2M_BOOL(true) }, { 5, LWM2M_BOOL(true) }, { 6, LWM2M_BOOL(true) }, { 7, LWM2M_BOOL(true) }, { 8, LWM2M_DYNAMIC(PreprocessingMode) }, { 9, LWM2M_STRING_RO("") }, }

detaileddescription.para: time for sending sensor values in ms
Timer handle for periodically reading sensor values

briefdescription.para: Disable LWM2M object instance to stop providing sensor device controls. Stops the sensors timer to frequently read and process values.
Enable LWM2M object instance to start providing sensor device controls. Starts sensors timer to frequently read and process values.
Initialize LWM2M object instance. Must be called before any other function call.
Handler to update the timer objects.
This file provides the implementation of LWM2MObjectSensorDevice module.
